game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Raise the ancient temple and claim its treasures.
game.description: The city of Eldarath was lost to the sands of time, but rumors speak of a hidden temple deep within the dunes. Retrieve the artifacts necessary to awaken the long-lost city.

task.objective: Ride to the nearby town and speak with the local elder.
task.description: The elder may possess knowledge of the temple's location or be able to provide a map.

task.objective: Explore the nearby desert and search for signs of the lost city.
task.description: The sun can be unforgiving, so bring plenty of water and a map. Look for any anomalies in the sand or structures that may indicate the city's location.
